verses.name: 1 Kings 2:9
verses.text: Now therefore hold him not guiltless: for thou art a wise man, and knowest what thou oughtest to do unto him; but his hoar head bring thou down to the grave with blood.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:10
verses.text: So David slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:11
verses.text: And the days that David reigned over Israel were forty years: seven years reigned he in Hebron, and thirty and three years reigned he in Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:12
verses.text: Then sat Solomon upon the throne of David his father; and his kingdom was established greatly.
